response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exceptional opportunity to acquire a product that holds significant value to both of us. Given its worth to you, I propose to offer it to you for $950,000. This price reflects a fair compromise between the intrinsic value of the product and my objective to maximize its worth. I believe this offer presents an attractive proposition that respects both our interests. Please let me know if you would like to discuss further details or consider this proposal.", "product_price": 950000}
